text: Drammen District Court is a district court located in Drammen, Norway. It covers the municipalities of Drammen, Hurum, Lier, Røyken, Sande and Svelvik and is subordinate Borgarting Court of Appeal.Drammen District Court ==References== == External links == *Official site Category:District courts of Norway Category:Organisations based in Drammen
title: Drammen District Court
